WorkItem.ClosedComment:
Hi,
I’m glad that you’ve been able to get through the issue you were facing.
Thanks,
WorkItem.Description:
When i add a Projectlink to an Project in VS2008 (german OS an german VS) everything works fine while working in this VS Session. 
 
But if i close the solution and reopen it all the project links wont load. 
But when i look with an editor in the project files everything looks fine like this:
 
  -->
  <ProjectExtensions>
    <VisualStudio>
      <FlavorProperties GUID="{A1591282-1198-4647-A2B1-27E5FF5F6F3B}">
        <SilverlightProjectProperties />
      </FlavorProperties>
      <UserProperties ProjectLinkReference="adf71d9c-3a1b-4720-904c-6881daa4cf2d" ProjectLinkerExcludeFilter="\\?desktop(\\.*)?$;\\?silverlight(\\.*)?$;\.desktop;\.silverlight;\.xaml;^service references(\\.*)?$;\.clientconfig;^web references(\\.*)?$" />
    </VisualStudio>
  </ProjectExtensions>
</Project>
 
When i open such an Project even the Project => Edit Links Dialog could not find a link.
If i add the the link again everything is OK for this VS Session and the Edit Links Dialog views the links.
WorkItem.Summary: Project Linker doesent load the linking from the projectfiles
